page.title: 17FACILITIES IN BACKWELL
page.content: Facilities in Backwell include a leisure centre. Every week there is a diving club, squash and tennis courts are used by the public. Roller discos are held in the sports hall. There is also a toddlers pool, and splash discos.There are 3 halls in Backwell. The WI Parish and Red Cross. The WI hall organises jumble sales and has a mini bus.Also a playgroup.At the parish hall they teach many dancing methods. There are cubs, scouts, guides, brownies and 2 youth clubs. Clubs in Backwell consist of a mens athletic club, football club which has its own stadium, boys' football club and rugby club. There is a drama group at the Playhouse where you can hire costumes. Other facilities in Backwell are shops, schools and churches. There are two parks. One holds a yearly festival.
